nl.tno.sensorstorm.timer

Interface TimerControllerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TimerParticleHandler

    public interface TimerControllerInterface
    This interface describes how an TimerTask itself can register for single and/or recurring timer tasks.
    Author:
    waaijbdvd

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerOperationForRecurringTimerTask(long timerFreqMs, TimerTaskInterface timerTask)
      Register for a recurring task.
      void registerOperationForSingleTimerTask(long wakeupTime, TimerTaskInterface timerTask)
      Register for a single task.

    • Method Detail

      • registerOperationForRecurringTimerTask

        void registerOperationForRecurringTimerTask(long timerFreqMs,
                                          TimerTaskInterface timerTask)
        Register for a recurring task.
        Parameters:
        timerFreq - The frequency how often the recurring task must be triggerd in milliseconds.
        timerTask - A link to the timerTask recurring method to be called.

      • registerOperationForSingleTimerTask

        void registerOperationForSingleTimerTask(long wakeupTime,
                                       TimerTaskInterface timerTask)
        Register for a single task.
        Parameters:
        timerFreq - The frequency how often the single task must be triggerd.
        timerTask - A link to the timerTask single method to be called.
